newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING - Megabios Corp for 2.5 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING - Megabios Corp for 2.5 mln shares.

text.p: Megabios Corp said on Friday it has filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission covering an initial public offering of 2.5 million shares of common stock with an estimated price range of $11 to $13 per share.
Megabios said in a press release that it is offering all of the shares.
In addition, the company has granted Montgomery Securities and Hambrecht & Quist, the managing underwriters, an option to purchase an additional 375,000 shares to cover over-allotments, if any.
Megabios expects to trade on the Nasdaq under the symbol MEGA.O.

The company said it expects to use the net proceeds from the offering to fund research and development activities, for leasehold improvements to its facilities, for the purchase of certain capital equipment and for working capital and general corporate purposes.
Megabios develops proprietary gene delivery systems and provides preclinical development expertise to create gene-based therapeutics for the treatment and prevention of genetic and acquired diseases.
